 

STATISTICAL SUMMARY 
2012 PRIMARY ELECTION 

 

Population of Oregon—July 1, 2011 .........................................................................................................   3,857,625 
 
Population of voting age in Oregon*........................................................................................................   2,991,228 
 
Individuals 18 years and older who are ineligible to vote due to legal impediments .............................  
 
Estimated eligible voters in Oregon .........................................................................................................   2,916,447 
 
Total registered voters in Oregon for 2012 Primary Election ..................................................................   2,021,263 
 
Percent of eligible’s registered to vote ....................................................................................................  
 
Number voting on November 2, 2012 ......................................................................................................   787,847 
 
Percent of registered voters voting ..........................................................................................................  
 
* This 2011 population estimate furnished by The Center for Population Research and Census

74,781
